title: Romantic interactive Hug Day slideshow with dreamy pastel blue vibe

requirements.text: Create a single-page, responsive interactive slideshow for “Hug Day” with soft fade/slide transitions between slides and a cohesive dreamy romantic vibe using light blue and pastel tones.

quotes:
Create a romantic, interactive slideshow webpage for “Hug Day”.
The slideshow should have soft animations (fade or slide transitions) and a dreamy romantic vibe with light blue and pastel tones.

acceptanceCriteria: The app renders a slideshow view with at least 2 slides and a visible transition (fade or slide) when navigating.
Layout adapts for mobile screens (no horizontal overflow; text and controls remain readable and tappable).
Color palette and styling consistently reflect light blue/pastel romantic theme.

requirements.text: Implement the main scene slide content to match the provided description: an outdoor location filled with pretty blue flowers, a couple standing close and hugging lovingly (girl: dark brown hair, beautiful blue princess gown; boy: black hair, sky-blue shirt). Overlay the headline text above the couple: “HAPPY HUG DAY” in a large elegant romantic font, and show the bottom note: “Cant hug u physically right now so sending u the virtual ones”.

quotes:
Scene details:
A couple hugging in a beautiful outdoor location filled with pretty blue flowers.
The girl has dark brown hair and is wearing a beautiful blue princess gown.
The boy has black hair and is wearing a sky-blue shirt.
They are standing close and hugging lovingly.
Text above their heads should say:
"HAPPY HUG DAY" (large, elegant romantic font).
At the bottom of the screen, add a small sweet note that says:
"Cant hug u physically right now so sending u the virtual ones"

acceptanceCriteria: The slide shows the specified headline text “HAPPY HUG DAY” above the couple and the exact bottom note text.
Typography for the headline is visually distinct (elegant/romantic) and larger than other text.
Scene artwork clearly includes blue flowers and the described couple styling (hair colors and clothing colors).

requirements.text: Add interactive slideshow controls: Next and Previous buttons with accessible labels, keyboard support (Left/Right arrow or Tab + Enter), and disabled or wrapped behavior at the ends (choose one and implement consistently).

quotes:
Make the slideshow interactive with:
Next and Previous buttons

acceptanceCriteria: Next and Previous buttons navigate between slides on click/tap.
Controls are usable on mobile (minimum comfortable tap size) and on desktop (keyboard operable).
Navigation behavior at first/last slide is consistent (either wrap-around or disables appropriately).

requirements.text: Add smooth fade-in animation for on-screen text (headline and bottom note) when the slide appears, synchronized with the slide transition for a soft romantic feel.
acceptanceCriteria: When a slide becomes active, its headline and note fade in smoothly (no sudden pop-in).
Text animation does not block navigation (buttons remain responsive during animation).

requirements.text: Implement ambient romantic effects on the slideshow page: floating heart animations, soft glowing effects, and gentle flower/petal animations in the background that do not obstruct readability of the main text.

quotes:
Floating heart animations
Add soft glowing effects and gentle flower or petal animations in the background.

acceptanceCriteria: Hearts float upward (or drift) continuously with a soft, lightweight animation.
Background includes subtle glow and petal/flower motion elements.
Effects maintain legibility: headline and note remain clearly readable on top of the scene.

requirements.text: Add optional soft romantic instrumental background music with a visible toggle button (play/pause). Ensure the default behavior does not violate typical browser autoplay restrictions (user interaction required before playback).

quotes: Soft background music (romantic instrumental, optional toggle button)

acceptanceCriteria: A music toggle control is visible and works (play/pause).
Music does not start automatically until the user interacts (e.g., presses play).
Music state (playing/paused) is reflected in the UI.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets needed for the scene and effects under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the slideshow (do not serve images through the backend).

quotes: A couple hugging in a beautiful outdoor location filled with pretty blue flowers.

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The slideshow uses these static assets directly from the frontend build output.
No backend endpoints are used for image delivery.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources must be composed, not edited).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts; if authentication is not needed, do not add it.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: User authentication (Internet Identity) and any account system.
Persisting slideshow state to the backend.
Third-party music streaming integrations (e.g., Spotify, YouTube).

required: Romantic outdoor illustration with a hugging couple among abundant blue flowers; girl has dark brown hair and a blue princess gown; boy has black hair and a sky-blue shirt (hug-day-scene.dim_1920x1080.png)
Soft semi-transparent heart shape/icon suitable for floating animation overlay, pastel pink/red tone (heart-particle.dim_128x128.png)
Single flower petal or small flower particle sprite in soft pastel blue/white for drifting animation (petal-particle.dim_128x128.png)
